attributes.action: Make all  knives with a hook on the  end that can't  stab make the blade blunter
attributes.additional_details: Because they are not doing enough to make school kids safer, there's  plenty  more  things the government  can  do but do  nothing the amount of money locking up criminal use the money to make  knives that won't stab,or will just cause a wound but not  death use plastic  material the government can change the knives and supply school kids with defence spray, have 999 facetime so  police  can veiw the attacker raping or stabbing it's also the biggest DETERANT
attributes.background: Ban knives get all  knives off the street and, start using meat cutters,or knives that need to be plugged in the kitchen  volunteer and community police go from  door to door collecting knives and giving a voucher to buy electric  knife we'll you done it  for  covid

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Ban sale of all sharply pointed kitchen knives:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641031
